data.name: Escape the Underground
data.detailed_description:
At the bottom of a massive underground dump, a sentient pile of sludge is born. After finding a discarded book that shows photographs of the surface, they decide to make the journey upward to see the outside world.



Escape the Underground is a time-attack, difficult platformer that centers around the Sludge's innate ability to cling to walls.
-Play through 28 levels to make your way toward the surface.
-Retry levels to bring your time down and beat them as fast as possible!
-Can you find the secret mode after completing the game?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
